name: Ext_R4_ActivityDefinition_specimenRequirement
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ActivityDefinition.specimenRequirement for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ActivityDefinition.specimenRequirement from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ActivityDefinition|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: What specimens are required to perform this action
element.definition: Defines specimen requirements for the action to be performed, such as required specimens for a lab test.
element.comment: `ActivityDefinition.specimenRequirement` maps to R5 `ActivityDefinition.specimenRequirement`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
